alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 16 at 3:36PM HST until January 18 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND THE BIG ISLAND AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A north (340-360 degrees) swell will maintain large surf along north facing shores of most islands tonight. As this swell declines on Wednesday, a west-northwest (300-310 degree) swell will arrive, maintaining large surf along north shores from Kauai to Maui and producing elevated surf along west facing shores of Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and the Big Island through Thursday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu and Maui, surf of 18 to 22 feet will decline overnight, then rebuild to 15 to 20 feet Wednesday. * WHERE...Niihau, Oahu North Shore, Maui Windward West, Kauai North, Molokai Windward, Molokai North, Maui Central Valley North and Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala
